name: SPACE RAT
description:
You are SPACE RAT and your lunchbox got stolen! 

What fiend would do such a thing?!

★

CONTROLS: Use arrow keys for everything or swipe if on mobile.

TIP: If you get "stuck" or nothing's happening, try moving in any direction and something should happen. Try interacting with things that are the same color as Space Rat. 

★

A short game made with Adam Le Doux's Bitsy engine! 

It's my first time using this engine and it was a LOT of fun. I'd love to do more!

Hope you enjoy! '_')b
